segments.text: This indoor kitchen drawing catches my eye immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's focused on drying that one plate intently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the faucet is filling the sink to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, it's overflowing everywhere, what a sight!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stream is hitting the cabinet doors and pooling below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the water, but she keeps on polishing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are up to mischief near the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's climbing high on that shaky two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's pulling cookies from the jar with one hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's waiting patiently, hand outstretched for hers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window lets in light from the tidy garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's infuriating how the woman's missing all these dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone could slip on that wet floor any second.
segments.speaker: PAR
